meaning: I bid you farewell / I shall take my leave
description: Archaic phrase used by a subject to a ruler. Used humorously on the internet to mean "I'm leaving" or "I'm out".

examples.translation: I shall take my leave... bye bye.

examples.chinese: 进去店铺看到价格后臣告退
examples.translation: I entered the shop, saw the price, and decided to take my leave.

examples.chinese: 根本就玩不过臣告退了
examples.translation: I can't beat this/handle this at all, I'm out (I shall take my leave).
